Description: Fragment of papyrus bearing 23 lines of Coptic text written along the fibres (recto) and 2 lines against the fibres (verso).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380785) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380785)
Ede 1972- / Writing and lettering in antiquity (no. 61)
Crum 1921 / Short Texts from Coptic Ostraca and Papyri (no. 178)
